com.jme3.renderer

Enum Limits

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Limits>
      • com.jme3.renderer.Limits
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Limits>

    public enum Limits
extends java.lang.Enum<Limits>
    Limits allows querying the limits of certain features in Renderer.

    For example, maximum texture sizes or number of samples.
